title: Cry Macho
description: In 1979, Texan ex-rodeo star Mike Milo agrees to help his former boss, Howard Polk, extricate his son Rafael \"Rafo\" Polk in Mexico. Rafo is living with his mother Leta and has turned to a life of crime, participating in cockfights with a rooster named Macho.

imdbInfo.ratingReason: Rated PG-13 for language and thematic elements.

properties.productionCompany: HBO Max / Warner Bros. Pictures / Malpaso Productions
